text: Lord of the Lost are a German rock band from Hamburg. They represented Germany in the Eurovision Song Contest 2023 with the song "Blood & Glitter". They finished in last place with 18 points. == References == Category:2007 establishments in Germany Category:German rock bands Category:Hamburg Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants Category:2000s German music groups Category:2010s German music groups Category:Musical groups established in 2007
title: Lord of the Lost
